title.narrative: DSIF - Zambia - Rehabilitation, Water supply and Sanitation Project

description.narrative: The project will improve health and well-being, and ensure sustainable management of water and sanitation through rehabilitation of water and sewerage treatment facilities in the Ndola Region. The project is in line with the national development strategy including the National Urban Water Supply and Sanitation Programme. Project sustainability and energy efficiency have high priority. Currently 50-70% of the clean water is lost due to a wide range of problems such as: broken pipes, pipe leakages, illegal pipe connection, unnecessary high pipe pressure, lack of institutional systems to handle repair and maintenance and weak reporting systems. The project includes rehabilitation and extension of existing facilities and technical assistance.
